REVIEW.Name: Staff
REVIEW.RHighlight: We nearly wept on leaving this fabulous haven and its awe-inspiring views to return to the real world. Nai Thon is one of our favourite Phuket beaches and this, combined with the delicious meals prepared by the chef and the caring service from the staff, left us feeling like well-pampered celebrities throughout our stay.
REVIEW.ROverallComments:
Vivid tropical skies, fiery sunsets and crystal-blue seas … Nai Thon Beach is a truly idyllic place, and viewed from our private poolside within Malaiwana Duplex it looks even more spectacular. We quickly relaxed and eased into the cool, subtle interior of the Duplex, which forms a calming contrast to the colourful tropical surrounds. Though the Duplex is found within a three-unit, three-storey residence we enjoyed complete peace and privacy here and neither heard nor saw any of our neighbours. The 15-metre pool is gorgeous.
The Duplex is the perfect place for what we call a full-spectrum holiday: enjoying five-star comfort and service while having the simple, natural pleasures of a tropical island at our doorstep. Having an early-morning swim in the pool, then a decadent breakfast served in style and total privacy on the terrace. Later on, a stroll along the sand and a snack of grilled chicken on a skewer from a beachside food vendor. Then back up to the Duplex in time for sunset cocktails and an elaborate dinner of rich Thai curries, spicy whole fish and stir-fried veggies, all planned the day before with our chef. Finally to bed, where the master suite offers a soft, sumptuous embrace and the promise of more fabulous sea views, just a curtain-peek away upon waking up tomorrow.
REVIEW.RUnpleasantSurprise: Though the Duplex is enticingly close to Nai Thon Beach, the route is steep, so if walking is a challenge an estate buggy can be summoned. With no safety fence around the pool, families with toddlers will need to be vigilant.

REVIEW.Name: Myo Thiha
REVIEW.ROverallComments:
Thank you so much for warmth hospitality. It was a great pleasure staying here during my holiday. This villa looks very elegant and clear. I enjoys every moment staying here, enjoy the facilities, seeing the view. I would recommend visitors to come here and stay with their family and friends. Totally worth it! This villa and this location is suitable for those who prefer to stay quiet and peaceful. Not quite a place for party people who wants to enjoy might life and entertainment, as it is far from Patong Beach – an hour drive from here to there. Highly recommended! I will be back here again soon.
Your sincerely Myo Thiha"

REVIEW.Name: Byoungha Lee
REVIEW.ROverallComments: Excellent customer experience in Malaiwana. The staff has delivered excellent service to us. Mr. Woody is nice and knowledge prepared well for us. The chef, Ms. Kalaya, prepared excellent meal for us. The Thai food she prepared was the best dishes we ate in Phuket. Ms. Bulhan and Bee also delivered excellent service to us. And I appreciate all them efforts and I wish visit Malaiwana again next time!

REVIEW.Name: Duke Technology Co. Ltd
REVIEW.ROverallComments: Thank you for everything. Thank you for everyone. Everything was good. Villa was very beautiful. Thanks!

REVIEW.Name: Onefine stay/Travel Keys Onefine stay/Travel Keys
REVIEW.ROverallComments: What an extraordinary week! We've never had such a holiday before. From the first moment, every need was met. The food at every meal was amazing and "Jeng" our chef, was happy for us all to watch and learn. Our 10 month old baby "Ivy" had the time of her life with so many willing arms and playmates - the staff were all wonderful with her and she loved them. Thank you so much for such a well organized and relaxing holiday. Special thanks "Lilly" for co-coordinating everything.

REVIEW.Name: Luxury Retreats
REVIEW.ROverallComments: We love the service, accommodation and location, so lovely. Thank you so very much for a wonderful stay.

REVIEW.Name: Sense Luxury Sense Luxury
REVIEW.ROverallComments: It’s a very great villa. We spent a very good time here. Good view, good service.

REVIEW.Name: Sense Luxury Sense Luxury
REVIEW.ROverallComments: It’s a very great villa. We spent a very good time here. Good view and good service.

REVIEW.Name: Vicky Chiu
REVIEW.ROverallComments: A lovely stay in a lovely space. We had a great time – excellent service and very helpful staff who did so much to take care to me. We were very happy through out the trip, would recommend.

REVIEW.Name: Femo Business Consulting Co. Ltd
REVIEW.ROverallComments: I’ve been Thailand many times and this time I choose Malaiwana and brought my family for vacation. My family enjoyed the vacation very much and the staff is very attentive. The chef surprised us every day. The nice view brightened our holiday. We had really have a good time. I hope to stay here next time. Thanks to lily and the staff in villa. Make us feel welcome as at home.

REVIEW.Name: Sense Luxury Sense Luxury
REVIEW.ROverallComments: It is seven days and very happy. Good food and good service, impressive.

REVIEW.Name: Of Villas Ministry
REVIEW.ROverallComments: It has been a delighted 4 days at Malaiwana. Katie and her team have gone out of their way to make our stay pleasant. The chef is incredible. She taught us same of her recipes and the food was incredible. The view from the apartment is stunning. It has been a memorable stay.

REVIEW.Name: Thai Holiday Service Co, Ltd
REVIEW.ROverallComments: All of us have the best 48 hours in Phuket. It's beautiful, joyful and relaxing. We will be back again .

REVIEW.Name: Mohammad Alnatheer
REVIEW.ROverallComments: Thank Lilly and her team. What a nice place.. exceptional!

REVIEW.Name: Mariam Almohannadi
REVIEW.ROverallComments: Thank you for everything, the service and the place was amazing. Thank you Katey and her team. What a nice place. It's our first time here but it will not be the last.
